TEAMS.DESCRIPTION: Add your team, make it a party

INVITED.HEADER: {0} has invited you to join the {1} team on EX.CO
INVITED.DESCRIPTION: The sooner you accept, the sooner you can start creating great interactive experiences for your readers

ADD_TEAMMATE.HEADER: Add a teammate to your account

REMOVE_TEAMMATE.DESCRIPTION: Removing {0} from your team will mean she can no longer edit content created by your team

PAYMENT_SUCCESSFUL.DESCRIPTION_ACTIVE: Your subscription is now active and we’ll send you an invoice shortly at {0}
PAYMENT_SUCCESSFUL.DESCRIPTION_TRIAL: Your will be charged at the end of your trial and receive an invoice at {0}

CANCELED.HEADER: We’ve cancelled your account for you
CANCELED.DESCRIPTION: But don’t worry, we’ll be here if you want to resubscribe in the future.
CANCELED.DESCRIPTION_2: We’d love to hear how we can do more. If you’d like to give us feedback, take our two-minute survey below.

BILLING.SUB_HEADER: View or edit your subscription preferences
BILLING.TRIAL_DESCRIPTION: Your account has {0} days remaining on the Pro Trial, discover more about the plans for when the trial ends.
BILLING.TRIAL_OVER_DESCRIPTION: You’ve finished your trial, select a plan to continue accessing all the great features you’ve been using.

PAYMENT.HEADER: You’re moments away from getting access to all the Pro plan features
PAYMENT.LOADER: ...we’re just putting the finishing touches on your subscription...

INVOICES.SUB_HEADER: keep track of your subscription payments
INVOICES.DESCRIPTION_EMPTY: Your invoices will appear here once you’ve been charged for a paid plan.

EMPTY_PAGE.HEADER: It’s a little quiet in here
EMPTY_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: Once you’ve started creating, here’s where you’ll find all the interesting data from your published experiences.

TOOLTIPS.PUBLISHED: The total number of EX.CO experiences published during the selected date range
TOOLTIPS.ITEM_LOADS: The total number of times the EX.CO experiences was loaded during the selected date range
TOOLTIPS.AVG_TIME_ON_PAGE: The average time spent with the EX.CO experience during the selected date range
TOOLTIPS.ENGAGEMENTS: The total number of times users dwell time was 15 seconds or the users interacted with the experience

REBRANDING_SIDEBAR.DESCRIPTION: But don’t worry, you can still access all of your articles and analytics using your existing login credentials.

SIDEBAR.HEADER: Sign up for your free EX.CO trial and get access to:
SIDEBAR.CHECKMARKS: The EX.CO interactive experience creator, Commercial lead forms and CTA buttons, Thousands of pictures and videos on Getty, Your own enhanced analytics dashboard, Video creation tools, And so much more

UPGRADE.DESCRIPTION: Take a look at the plans to see which other features you could get access to.

TWO_DAYS_LEFT.DESCRIPTION: Have you tried creating all of the experiences available to you? Try something new today

SUBSCRIPTION_ENDED.HEADER_TRIAL: Oh no, your trial is over
SUBSCRIPTION_ENDED.HEADER_SUBSCRIPTION: Oh no, your subscription is canceled
SUBSCRIPTION_ENDED.DESCRIPTION: Take a look at the packages to find out how you can keep discovering more great insights.

INTRO.DESCRIPTION:
Hey there! Meet our updated platform - all the content tools you love, optimized for your commercial goals and enhanced with new features. Because you’ve been with us for a while, your account will be in free trial mode until we reach out with more details (or you can feel free to contact us!).
The EX.CO (formerly Playbuzz) team

FORM.HEADER: First things first, tell us a little about yourself
FORM.USER_INTENTS: Communicate with my team/ internally, Improve my SEO, Educate readers, Engage audiences, Research, Supercharge segmentation, Discover insights, Convert sales, Other
FORM.COMPANY_TYPES: Publisher, Advertising Agency, Banking, Communications, Education, Entertainment, Environmental, Fashion, Finance, Food, Government, Healthcare, Hospitality, Insurance, Media, Not For Profit, Recreation, Retail, Technology, Transportation, Other
FORM.ROLES: Director, VP / C-level, Project Owner, Team leader, Team member, Freelancer

JOIN_SAAS.LOADER: We’re getting everything ready for you
